title: Projects
text:
Welcome to my project portfolio!
Here are a few examples of my academic and professional work in business analytics, operations management, and data-driven consulting.



Course: Service Operations Management
Tools: Excel, R, Monte Carlo Simulation
- Analyzed a global adhesive request workflow across four international sites (Puerto Rico, Wichita, Bangladesh, and the Philippines).
- Applied Lean methodology and simulation modeling to minimize labor cost while maintaining process efficiency.
- Proposed staffing alternatives based on 95% confidence intervals for completed requests.
üìà Result: Improved throughput by 18% and reduced cost by 12%.




Course: Six Sigma and Quality Analytics
Tools: Excel, Python, Statistical Process Control
- Conducted time-series analysis of hospital indicators (infection rate, readmission rate, and cesarean rate).
- Used control charts and confidence intervals to identify system-driven variations.
- Recommended data visualization dashboards for continuous quality improvement.
üìä Result: Enhanced stability and reduced variation in key performance metrics.




Course: Operations Analytics
Tools: R, Queue Theory (M/M/s), Visualization
- Compared segmented vs.¬†universal IT support systems using queue simulation.
- Modeled service time distribution, waiting time, and utilization rates.
- Recommended optimal staffing mix balancing cost and customer experience.
üïí Result: Reduced average waiting time by 23% with minimal cost increase.




Professional Project
Tools: Excel, Market Analysis, Grant Writing
- Supported NIH Fast-Track SBIR proposal for HemoMax (a hydrogel-based surgical hemostatic device).
- Drafted business plan, commercialization strategy, and societal impact sections.
- Collaborated with industry partners and prepared materials for NIH Catalyze Program submission.
üöÄ Result: Advanced proposal to Phase II review with strong feedback on innovation and feasibility.




You can find additional data visualization and modeling projects on my GitHub portfolio:
üëâ Visit My GitHub

title: About Me
text:
Welcome to my personal website!
I‚Äôm currently pursuing my Master‚Äôs in Business Analytics at Boston University, where I combine data-driven insights with strategic thinking to solve real-world problems.



Before joining BU, I earned a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Mathematics and Law, and later a Master of Laws (LL.M).
I also worked for two years as a Business Assistant in International Trade, where I managed contracts and data-driven decision processes.




I‚Äôm passionate about: - Business Analytics & Consulting
- Operations Management
- Process Optimization & Simulation Modeling
Through my work, I aim to bridge analytical thinking and legal reasoning to support smarter business decisions.




I‚Äôm a dog person üê∂ currently living with a German Shepherd.
In my free time, I enjoy snowboarding, cooking, and exploring data visualization techniques that tell compelling stories.




Right now, I‚Äôm enhancing my technical portfolio with projects in: - Simulation and Optimization (R & Excel) - Machine Learning Applications (Python) - Healthcare Operations & Process Analysis

Thank you for visiting my site ‚Äî feel free to check out my Projects or Contact pages to connect!
